oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Commission Certificate for Benjamin Haught
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This commission certificate was issued to Benjamin Haught by the Virginia governor. Haught was assigned as Captain of the volunteer company attached to the 123rd Regiment of the 23rd Brigade and the 3rd Division of Virginia Militia. Item is a part of a large series, all of which was digitized by the Library of Virginia. Haught was from Tyler County, Virginia/West Virginia.
